title: 香港人學英文最大問題就係太介懷人地目光！

replies.msg:
其實一個土生土長既香港人由幼稚園開始讀左十五年英文（唔計入大學啦）
理論上英文水平應該係唔差 應該對答係流利
但實際上你係大學都總會見到有啲大學生好怕講英文 好避忌去講英文 連presentation都要打好哂稿咁照讀你就知成個學英文方式真係失敗
我個人認為失敗唔係在於課程 教育制度問題（雖然都係某程度關事）
但最大問題係學生太介意人地點睇佢講英文

但明明有啲外國人講英文都係柒下柒下
點解啲學生唔可以放膽啲試多啲呢 真係錯左既咪比人笑完下次汲取教訓唔好錯咪得囉 邊有人學語言唔會犯錯架
從錯誤中學習就係咁簡單

溝通最緊要係簡易明白 講多啲聽多啲 其實學英文個效率就會大好多
學術野無人理

Pish

樓主講起學英文，小弟以前有個刻骨銘心既經歷：

12歲個年同屋企人去劍橋玩，小弟係讀教會小學所以英文都唔算陌生。細個時好怕羞又唔識點講野，同埋啲鬼佬個個都米八英倫連登仔。不過跟爸爸媽媽就唔洗出聲講野都有人照顧。所以都冇咩問題

有日下就佢地兩個出左酒店去倫敦睇景點，剩底我係酒店玩GBA(仲記得係牧場物語女生版)。中午就自自然然肚餓想食野架啦。又唔知酒店有野食(個時住類似Bnb個種舊式歐陸酒店，一間大屋8間房個種。唔係4星石屎樓)，GBA冇電又餓到死膽粗粗攞住兩張50鎊去買野食。個時唔知英國有咩食得，鄉下又冇超市m記。千辛萬苦先係條街搵到間cafe。我就以為係大家樂個種可以叫外賣。係門口渡黎渡去，最後不敵肚餓就厚住臉皮入去叫飯。

入到去比個肥婆問要咩，搞左一大輸都唔知菜單個啲三文治有咩，淨係知sandwich ,tea,coffee,pasta個種程度(個時咩bagel意粉都唔識)，就尻叫左個Fish n chips。佢又跟問要咩Fish咩疏屎。我完全聽唔明佢up mud9。佢又唔耐煩(依家睇反可能係冇講plz thx個啲垃圾字)，表達唔到個一刻撚到本小毒撚差啲喊。搞完一大輪比張50鎊佢，佢手勢比我感覺係找唔出大紙，唔賣。個時我尷尬到紅都面晒。搞左一大輪有個鬼佬主動幫我打散張大紙，最後先有飯食。(雖然冇醬又油又粗好撚難食)

就係個次芥蒂我先努力去讀oral，隔左幾年出國留學就好快上到手同鬼仔玩。雖然依家都係冇女
Sorry for 1999

同埋學校係唔會用一個所謂optimal instruction 既framework去教學，學生唔識得透過negotiations 去理解language 既運用。

I would like to share my experience.
I got D in HKALE/HkCEE and wasn't really good in English.
Basically I sucked in English, couldn't get much in the school.
Around year 2 in the Uni, I deliberately studied British accents by watching tons of comedies and accent tutorial.

Comedies:
Mind your language
Come fly with me
IT Crowd
Only Fools and Horses

These were my favourite comedies and really funny. Last year, I took DSE again, other than level 4 in stupid writing (u can tell by my writing here), I got reading and speaking 5**, listening 5*. Wasn't really amazing but great improvement.

My British accent is almost there. Most people are confused if I was from London now. Even people from Wales.haha. Anyway learning a language is an ongoing process, there is no end for it. Hope my experience can help some bros here.

I would like to share my experience.
I got D in HKALE/HkCEE and wasn't really good in English.
Basically I sucked in English, couldn't get much in the school.
Around year 2 in the Uni, I deliberately studied British accents by watching tons of comedies and accent tutorial.

Comedies:
Mind your language
Come fly with me
IT Crowd
Only Fools and Horses

These were my favourite comedies and really funny. Last year, I took DSE again, other than level 4 in stupid writing (u can tell by my writing here), I got reading and speaking 5**, listening 5*. Wasn't really amazing but great improvement.

My British accent is almost there. Most people are confused if I was from London now. Even people from Wales.haha. Anyway learning a language is an ongoing process, there is no end for it. Hope my experience can help some bros here.

I got D in HKALE/HkCEE and wasn't really good in English.
Basically I sucked in English, couldn't get much in the school.
Around year 2 in the Uni, I deliberately studied British accents by watching tons of comedies and accent tutorial.

Comedies:
Mind your language
Come fly with me
IT Crowd
Only Fools and Horses

口音（連音）應該有九個部分
1, 尾字非aeiou+aeiou 要連
Sleep in > sleepin
2，相似音是但揀1個
Need to > needo/ neeto
3, aeiou+t/d+aeiou
Or
R+ td+ aeriou
T 轉d
Party > pardi water> wader
注， party 連音只聲 , 所以y =I (自己讀吓party ）
4，t d p b k g + 非 aeiou tdpbkg要食尾音而立即讀下個字
Would be > would(d停，唔特1聲，立即be)
Would¬be
5, 非aeiou+ td+非aeiou
Td
Diamond ring > diamonring

6, 當 t 之後冇耐係n
T之後立即讀en
Button > buttn
Curtain＞curtn
Important >importn
7, n s z +th th
Is that > is at
Guess that > guessat
8, aeiou+nt+ aeiou
T
International >inerational
9 aeiou+aeiou
呢個小心
O下個要加w
Go on> gowon
Chloe>chlowe
其他 ＋y
To ask> toyask

From YouTube hello spoken English

口音（連音）應該有九個部分
1, 尾字非aeiou+aeiou 要連
Sleep in > sleepin
2，相似音是但揀1個
Need to > needo/ neeto
3, aeiou+t/d+aeiou
Or
R+ td+ aeriou
T 轉d
Party > pardi water> wader
注， party 連音只聲 , 所以y =I (自己讀吓party ）
4，t d p b k g + 非 aeiou tdpbkg要食尾音而立即讀下個字
Would be > would(d停，唔特1聲，立即be)
Would¬be
5, 非aeiou+ td+非aeiou
Td
Diamond ring > diamonring

6, 當 t 之後冇耐係n
T之後立即讀en
Button > buttn
Curtain＞curtn
Important >importn
7, n s z +th th
Is that > is at
Guess that > guessat
8, aeiou+nt+ aeiou
T
International >inerational
9 aeiou+aeiou
呢個小心
O下個要加w
Go on> gowon
Chloe>chlowe
其他 ＋y
To ask> toyask
